name: They were my Colors
description:
For Windows

Description:

This is a game about a adventurous ball on a quest  acquiring color from every character it interacts , with a little surprise at the end.

If you download They were my Colors please do leave a comment down below!

Controls:

Q to Interact/Talk

Arrows/WASD to move

Space to Jump

Credits:

Game Programming, Design and Art by Sabiha Shaik.

Music by Estudio Cafafo  

Sound by  freesfx
